featured.text: The tower, of pinewood, will be built on eight pillars and will be topped with a flower of five metal petals of 700 square meters each.

definition.zh_def: 松木，一種來自松樹的木材，通常用於建築和家具製作。
definition.en_def: Pinewood, a type of wood derived from pine trees, commonly used in construction and furniture making.
definition.example: The carpenter chose pinewood for the new table because it is both affordable and durable.
